name: 0 - Intro
_source: speak;Darkslayer; Hey everyone, I'm Darkslayer, the main dev of the hack you're playing.{w} I hope y'all enjoy my rom, and please give any feedback if possible!{w}{c:expression;Darkslayer;Smile} Now, let's get this hack started!
music;Is a Transparent Enemy our Ally
speak;Vargax; Isabelle, are the soldiers ready?
speak;Isabelle; Yes, my dear. They await only your word to start marching.
speak;Vargax; Excellent.{w} Then it appears we are ready to start...
speak;Isabelle; I believe it's time we introduced you to your retainers from now on.{w} They will be accompanying you on a very special mission to find the Hell Ring.
speak;Amon; You want{tgm}...{tgm}<iconvo>me</> to do it?{w} Not any of the soldiers or knights?
speak;Isabelle; Yes, you.{w} Your retainers will be accompanying you as well.
speak;Maya;...{tgm}{w} Your Majesty, might I kill a few humans on our travels?;;no_talk
speak;Isabelle; Only if they get in your way.{w} If you bring undue attention to our kingdom, you will be duly punished.
speak;Maya; Understood.{w}{c:expression;Maya;Smile} None shall live to tell the tale.
speak;Isabelle; ...{tgm}So long as you understand.{w} Secrecy is of utmost importance.{w} Do not fail me or our kingdom.;no_talk
speak;Lilith; My first mission with the prince...{w} Let's see how this goes, hehe...;;;thought_bubble;no_talk
speak;Isabelle; Are you sure about this, dear?{w} Sending our child out there with{tgm}...{tgm}with the humans?
speak;Vargax; Everything is going to be alright, my love.{w}{c:expression;Vargax;Smile} He will play his role quite nicely...
